mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_ID, ONLINE_ID, PRODUCE_ID, ONLINE_TITLE, SPEC_NAME, BUY_COUNT, BUY_PRICE, CASHBACK_AMOUNT, RETURN_COUNT, CASHBACK_TOTAL, BUY_UNIT, RETURN_STATE, USER_ID, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_STATE
mapper.insert: insert into ORD_ORDER_DETAIL (ID, ORDER_ID, ONLINE_ID, PRODUCE_ID, ONLINE_TITLE, SPEC_NAME, BUY_COUNT, BUY_PRICE, CASHBACK_AMOUNT, RETURN_COUNT, CASHBACK_TOTAL, BUY_UNIT, RETURN_STATE, USER_ID, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_STATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{produceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashbackAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cashbackTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cashbackCommissionSlot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cashbackCommissionState,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update ORD_ORDER_DETAIL
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ONLINE_ID = #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCE_ID = #{produceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC_NAME = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUY_COUNT = #{buyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUY_PRICE = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASHBACK_AMOUNT = #{cashbackAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_COUNT = #{returnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASHBACK_TOTAL = #{cashbackTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUY_UNIT = #{buyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_STATE = #{returnState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT = #{cashbackCommissionSlot,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CASHBACK_COMMISSION_STATE = #{cashbackCommissionState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ORD_ORDER_DETAIL set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ONLINE_ID = #{onlineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCE_ID = #{produceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC_NAME = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_COUNT = #{buyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUY_PRICE = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASHBACK_AMOUNT = #{cashbackAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURN_COUNT = #{returnCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASHBACK_TOTAL = #{cashbackTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUY_UNIT = #{buyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_STATE = #{returnState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT = #{cashbackCommissionSlot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_STATE = #{cashbackCommissionState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ORDER_ID, ONLINE_ID, PRODUCE_ID, ONLINE_TITLE, SPEC_NAME, BUY_COUNT, BUY_PRICE, CASHBACK_AMOUNT, RETURN_COUNT, CASHBACK_TOTAL, BUY_UNIT, RETURN_STATE, USER_ID, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT, CASHBACK_COMMISSION_STATE from ORD_ORDER_DETAIL
mapper.update: UPDATE ORD_ORDER_DETAIL SET CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT = #{cashbackCommissionSlot+1,jdbcType=TINYINT} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND CASHBACK_COMMISSION_SLOT = #{cashbackCommissionSlot,jdbcType=TINYINT}
